#summary How to install OAWire for your browser.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The instructions are browser specific rather than operating system specific. Please follow the instructions for the browser you use.


= Firefox =

  # Download the latest .XPI file to your computer.
  # If Firefox is not running, launch it.
  # Either press Ctrl+O and browse to the .XPI file you downloaded or drag and drop the file into your browser window.
  # Install the addon. You can trust the author. Restart your browser when asked to.
